title: Not Without Her
description: After spending the last two years working his way up the ladder in the Sanchez Cartel, undercover agent Elias Delgado has finally made it to a position to be invited to the Sanchez Estate in Mexico; where he will gain the final knowledge needed to stop their cocaine supply from coming into the country. But nothing can prepare Eli for the sex slave given to him to keep him entertained at night during his stay, and the internal conflict about how he responds to her, or the lengths that he will go to try and save her.
author: Mitzi D. Lane
